snippet.title: Grim & Evil: Battle Forts
snippet.description:
Talk about a blast from the past. I've been searching for this game
for the longest, but I didn't know what the name of it was. Thankfully, it showed up while I was watching videos.

So the objective of this game is to inflict 100 hit points on Estroy's headquarters. You have 100 gold coins to use for weapons, and the more powerful the weapon, the more it costs so you gotta chose wisely. The flame thrower is OP!

Since Flash isn't supported anymore, I'm using an archive called Flashpoint Infinity. This is an archive of flash games on the internet ready to play on the go. Here's the link to Flashpoint by BlueMaxima. Go to downloads and click the version you'd like! 

You can download it here: https://bluemaxima.org/flashpoint/
